Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Whiner \Whin"er\, n. One who, or that which, whines. [1913 Webster]
whiner n : a person given to excessive complaints and crying and whining [syn: {complainer}, {moaner}, {sniveller}, {crybaby}, {bellyacher}, {grumbler}, {squawker}]
